name: externfcts
brief:
Support for externally differentiated functions in ADOL-C tapes

Provides mechanisms to incorporate user-supplied derivative code for
functions that cannot or should not be traced (e.g., library calls,
specialized solvers, discontinuous functions). The user registers
callback functions for forward and reverse mode evaluation.

Use cases:
- Integrating external solvers (linear algebra, sparse systems)
- Hand-coded derivatives for performance-critical sections
- Functions from non-ADOL-C libraries
- Discontinuous or non-differentiable operations with custom handling

Callback modes:
- zos_forward: zero-order scalar (function evaluation only)
- fos_forward/fos_reverse: first-order scalar
- fov_forward/fov_reverse: first-order vector
- hos_forward/hos_reverse: higher-order scalar
- hov_forward/hov_reverse: higher-order vector
